name: Pricing Grid
description: Responsive pricing cards with featured plan highlight, feature lists, and CTAs. Supports 2-4 pricing tiers.

section_subtitle.fallback: Choose the plan that works best for you

tailwind_classes.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-heading font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4
tailwind_classes.subtitle: text-lg text-gray-600 max-w-2xl mx-auto
tailwind_classes.card: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-200 p-8 hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow
tailwind_classes.card_featured: relative bg-white rounded-2xl border-2 border-primary-600 p-8 shadow-xl -mt-4 mb-4
tailwind_classes.badge: absolute -top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 inline-flex px-4 py-1.5 bg-primary-600 text-white text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-full
tailwind_classes.cta_default: mt-8 block w-full text-center px-6 py-3 border-2 border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-50 text-gray-900 font-semibold rounded-xl transition-colors
tailwind_classes.cta_featured: mt-8 block w-full text-center px-6 py-3 bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700 text-white font-semibold rounded-xl transition-colors shadow-lg shadow-primary-600/25
